subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Phillies pitcher Brett Myers, saying he embarrassed his family and the team with his arrest last week on charges of assaulting his wife, will take a leave of absence through the All-Star Game break.
snippet: Phillies pitcher Brett Myers, saying he embarrassed his family and the team with his arrest last week on charges of assaulting his wife, will take a leave of absence through the All-Star Game break.
